artist: Painter: After Frans Pourbus II; Engraver: Anthony de Marcenay de Ghuy
description: half length portrait facing left, looking out; wearing armor, ruff, and sash; in a window with inscriptions on pedestal below
inscription:
Signature, Title, Date, and Inscriptions

at top in black: Pl. 20e de l\'OEuvre | below image in black: MAXIMILIEN DE BETHUNE/ PRINCE SOUVERAIN D\'ENRICHMONT, ET DE BOIS/ BELLES DU DE SULLY, PAIR, MARECHAL, ET/ GRAND MAITRE DE L\'ARTILLERIE DE FRANCE .../ F. Pourbus pinx   Ant.De Marcenty de Ghuy sculp 1763 / 3 mor lines in French | on sheet in pencil: 2-226
title: Portrait of Maximilien de Bethune
